ARE4351 - Teaching Art in the Elementary.name: ARE4351 - Teaching Art in the Elementary School

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission into the Art Education Program or Art Education Minor.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Transition from university art studio practices to public school teaching of art. Organizing, designing and analyzing art experiences, activities and classroom environments for elementary school.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

ARE4356 - Teaching Art Appreciation & Cr.name: ARE4356 - Teaching Art Appreciation & Criticism in the Classroom

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: An examination of art appreciation programs and concepts toward planning curriculum for the study of art history, popular art, art criticism, and aesthetics for specific educational settings.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Theories and methodologies for designing, implementing and administering art programs for a variety of populations.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: School of Visual Arts and Design

ARE2000 - Early Childhood Art and Creati.name: ARE2000 - Early Childhood Art and Creativity

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: An examination of developmental patterns in children's artistic behaviors and appropriate instructional strategies to be implemented.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission to the College of Education, Art Education Program or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Concepts, principles, and methods of integrating art processes into the education of students with physical, emotional, and mental exceptionalities.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

ARE4352 - Teaching Art in the Secondary.name: ARE4352 - Teaching Art in the Secondary School

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission into the Art Education program or Art Education Minor.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Transition from university art studio practices to High School Teaching of art. Organizing, designing and analyzing art experiences and activities appropriate for junior high and high school children. Examination of teaching methodology relative to the high school and junior high school settings.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

ARE4453 - Studio Experiences in Art Educ.name: ARE4453 - Studio Experiences in Art Education

Prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
Prerequisites.text: Admission into the College of Education, Art Education Program required or C.I.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Materials available for instruction in public schools will be explored in depth in relation to their appropriateness and productive qualities.

College.title: College
College.text: College of Community Innovation and Education

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: A supervised experience for students to facilitate art programming in a variety of community settings.

Department.title: Department
Department.text: School of Visual Arts and Design
